title: Verify SQLite history stores all analysis runs
description: Verify SQLite history module stores all analysis runs correctly: metadata, findings, timestamps. Add tests for history queries and edge cases (concurrent runs, corrupted DB).

title: Benchmark performance: 100K log lines target <10s
description: Run performance benchmarks: parse 100K log lines, analyze with rules+ML, measure wall-clock time. Target: <10s on 2-core/8GB machine. Profile bottlenecks if over target.

title: Implement daemon mode with PID file management
description: Implement daemon mode with PID file creation, signal handling (SIGTERM/SIGINT), stdout/stderr redirection, and graceful cleanup. Use python-daemon library or implement with os.fork/setsid.

title: Implement --watch command: scheduled batch mode
description: Implement 'vpsguard watch' CLI command that runs scheduled batch analysis. Loads config, daemonizes, runs analysis at intervals, persists to SQLite, and handles alerts. Depends on config and daemon mode.

title: Add HTML report with interactive filtering
description: Enhance HTML reporter with interactive filtering (by severity, IP, time range), collapsible sections, and CSS for better readability. HTML reporter exists but needs polish.

title: Update all documentation for --watch command
description: Update README.md with watch command usage, CLAUDE.md with watch architecture, AGENTS.md with watch context, CLI --help text, design doc Phase 4-5 status. Ensure consistency across all docs.

title: Add configurable schedule intervals to vpsguard.toml
description: Add [watch.schedule] section to vpsguard.toml with interval, retention_days, and alert_thresholds config. This allows users to customize how often the watch daemon runs analysis and how to trigger alerts.
